name: Epic Battle War Strategy
description:
Epic Battle War Strategy Simulator provides a realistic war zone and epic battlefield.”

Step into the battlefield for the ultimate battle as an army troop commander of the current era unlike most critical tactical battle in the world of Orcs, medieval knights or the army of dead (Skeletons), you get use all the weapons to plan your battlefield strategy and witness one of the most epic battles ever seen in the history; Because you will devise a strategy, hand pick your warriors and lead them in to the warzone for the ultimate battle.

Form your strategies, choose your troops and place them wisely on the battlefield and beat every opponent !

This war game! Offers you both the thrill of the battlefield simulator with War Strategy in ultimate epic battle as well as the mind boggling challenges with war simulator of devising a defense & attack strategy.

Defense of your army base is all in your hands now with battlefield simulator, every moment spent on the battle grounds is a do or die situation, there is no running back now. Your foes will keep upgrading and devising an un-beatable strategy for battlefield simulator, but don’t just lose hope kill your enemy by wits and win the strategical puzzle. .
Best graphics and the enhanced intelligence, you can now experience ultimate battle simulations !

Features of Super Robot Battle Simulator:
* Quality graphics
* Improved performance with war simulator
* Fun and interactive archer battle simulator
* Collect coins on successful completion of each level.

Conquer every war that you face by building a totally accurate strategy. C’mon commander an exciting journey of dynamic and exciting real battles are awaits you in this epic war simulator game.
